code: import axios from"axios";export var getAllUser=function getAllUser(){return axios.get("/api/user/all");};export var getUserById=function getUserById(id){return axios.get("/api/user",{data:id});};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(User){return axios.post("/api/user/delete",User);};export var addNewUser=function addNewUser(User){return axios.post("/api/user/add",User);};export var updateUser=function updateUser(User){return axios.post("/api/user/update",User);};
